![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/c4d5b8dcdbb91f77edf154ab75afbac4.png)

We can take apart $\green{8}$ to make $\pink6$ and $\blue2$.    
We can put together $\pink6$ and $\blue2$ to make $\green{8}$.

question.content:
**Fill in the blanks.**  

 | | |
:-: | :-: | :-:
$8-6=$ [[☃ input-number 1]] | because | [[☃ input-number 2]] $+$ $6=8$
